category.name: Maintenance.Subscription Monitor
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_subscription_available_subscription_handlers
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of Action Handlers that the user can select when creating a Subscription object from a client. If the handler does not appear in this list, the user cannot select it as part of a Subscription. Valid values are the IDs of the handlers. If no handlers are specified, the handler "IMAN_Smtp_Mail_Notify" will be used by default. This handler will always be included even if it is not present in the list.
